projects.title: Document Mapping with NLP
projects.description: A natural language processing application that visualizes document relationships through 2D mapping. Combines FOSS4G technologies with text analysis for spatial document visualization.

projects.title: GIS-based Urban Planning Tool
projects.description: An open-source web application for urban planning analysis using geospatial data. Developed for supporting municipal planning processes with interactive mapping capabilities.

projects.title: Coffee Supply Chain Tracker
projects.description: A blockchain-based application for tracking coffee supply chain from Sri Lankan farmers to consumers. Developed during social business project to ensure fair trade practices.

projects.title: Spatial Data Infrastructure Toolkit
projects.description: A comprehensive toolkit for developing countries to implement spatial data infrastructure. Created based on experience from Ukraine and Rwanda projects.
